member.name: T:Rareform.Extensions.LongExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:Rareform.Extensions.LongExtensions.ToSizeString(System.Int64)
member.summary: Formats the value to a string, that has the appropriate size-suffix.
member.returns: A formatted string with the appropriate size-suffix.
member.remarks: The formatting is based on 1024-byte splitting. This means, that the suffix changes every power of 1024, till 1024^12 (Terabyte).
member.example: For a value of 1, the result string is "1 B". For a value of 1024, the result string is "1 KB".

member.summary: Converts a value back.
